title: Avatar rules
description: Please keep avatars under 70k polygons, no audio spam, and keep shaders VRChat safe for our events.

title: Weekly events
description: We host raid nights on Fridays and chill lobbies on Sundays. Use /event-create to announce community events.

title: Moderation
description: Respect others, no harassment, and follow Discord + VRChat ToS. Staff can step in if needed.
